person.persName: Matthew Martin Lyon (Lyon County, Kentucky, miller)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, miller. Kentucky native. Married Eudora Hanson Mims Lyon in 1855. Father of Carrie Lyon and Matthew Lyon. Miller in Lyon County in 1860. Owned 10 enslaved persons in Lyon County in 1860.
